title: Prime minister condoles death of army chiefâ€™s mother
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 25 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Tuesday extended his heartfelt condolence over the passing of the mother of Chief of the Army Staff General Syed Asim Munir.
The prime minister expressed solidarity with the bereaved family in this hour of grief, according to a PM Office press release.
He also prayed to Allah Almighty for the eternal peace of the departed soul.
